# TopGolf Tweets

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rtweet)

auth_setup_default()
auth_has_default()
```

```{r eval=FALSE}
tgdf <- search_tweets("topgolf", n = 1000, include_rts = FALSE, lang = "en")
```

```{r eval=FALSE}
# data
tgdf1 <- tgdf %>%
  select(id_str, retweet_count, favorite_count,  created_at)

#text
tgdf2 <- tgdf %>%
  select(id_str, full_text, display_text_range, text)
```

```{r eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(DBI)
library(RPostgres)
library(dplyr)

con <- dbConnect(RPostgres::Postgres(),dbname = 'postgres',
      host = 'localhost',
      port = 5432,
      user = 'postgres',
      password = 'vannah')
```

```{r eval=FALSE}
dbWriteTable(con, "tg_data", tgdf1, append = TRUE)
dbWriteTable(con, "tg_text", tgdf2, append = TRUE)
```

```{r eval=FALSE}
# disconnect from database
dbDisconnect(con)
```
